name: golden-layout-react-redux
description: example showing how to use react-redux with golden-layout

scripts.build-equix: export NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=12048" && chmod +x changeProduct.sh && ./changeProduct.sh && chmod +x build-equix.sh && ./build-equix.sh && webpack

scripts.package-all: npm run package-mac && npm run package-window && npm run package-linux
scripts.precommit: npm run lint-fix && npm run lint
